Class: RFDevice

RFDevice()

new RFDevice()

Properties:
Name Type Description
driver RFDriver

The driver instance
options Object

The options for this device as configured in the 'rf' property of the driver
signal Signal

The signal instance for this device instance
logger Logger

The logger instance for this device instance
Fires:
  • RFDevice#event:data

Members

(static) deviceState

Returns all (persistent) state variables on the device instance.

(static) id

returns the id property in the device data object

Methods

(static) assembleDeviceObject() → {Object|null}

This function combines all data set to this device into an object which will be used to add this device. The object can contain all properties which can be given to Homey.addDevice in the pair view. The default implementation should suffice and will set this.getData(), this.getSettings(), this.getStore() and this.getCapabilities() on the new device.

Returns:

result The device object or null if the device object could not be created.

Type
Object | null

(static) assembleSendData(sendData) → {Object}

This function combines the data given to this.send() with device data to generate a complete device data object. The default implementation will extend this.getData with this.lastFrame and the sendData object given to this.send()

Parameters:
Name Type Description
sendData Object

The data object given to this.send(data)
Returns:

result the data object that should be send using dataToPayload

Type
Object

(static) assertDevice() → {Promise}

This function is used while pairing to check if the device has all properties to create a valid device object to add to Homey

Returns:

result If the device is valid.

Type
Promise

(static) codewheelsToData(codewheelIndexes) → {Object|null}

Static method that generates a device data object from a codewheelIndexes array This method is only necessary when your driver uses the 'codewheel' rf_template

Parameters:
Name Type Description
codewheelIndexes Array

The codewheelIndexes array that the user set in the pair wizard
Returns:

result the device data object or null if the codewheelIndexes array was invalid

Type
Object | null

(static) dataToPayload(data) → {Array.<number>|null}

Static method that parses a device data object into a payload array

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

The data object
Returns:

payload the payload that Homey can send

Type
Array.<number> | null

(static) dipswitchesToData(dipswitches) → {Object|null}

Static method that generates a device data object from a dipswitch array This method is only necessary when your driver uses the 'dipswitch' rf_template

Parameters:
Name Type Description
dipswitches Array

The dipswitch array that the user set in the pair wizard
Returns:

result the device data object or null if the dipswitch array was invalid

Type
Object | null

(static) generateData() → {Object}

Static method that generates a random device data object which can be used to program a device e.g. a socket with This method is only necessary when your driver uses the 'program' rf_template

Returns:

result A random device data object

Type
Object

(static) getLastFrame() → {Object}

returns the last frame received for this device

Returns:

lastFrame the data object of the last received frame.

Type
Object

(static) matchesCmd(cmdObj) → {boolean}

Compares a cmd object with this device to check if the cmd object is relevant for this device. The default implementation compares the cmdType and cmdSubType properties in the deviceData object and default config with the cmdObject.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
cmdObj Object

The received cmd object

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
id String

The cmd id received
type String <optional>

The type of the received cmd object
cmd String

The command id of the received cmd object
subtype String <optional>

The subType of the received cmd object
label String

The label of the received cmd object
Returns:

result If the data object is intended for this device.

Type
boolean

(static) matchesData(data) → {boolean}

Compares a data object with this device to check if the data object is relevant for this device. The default implementation compares the id property in the device data object to the id value of the data object.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

The received data object
Returns:

result If the data object is intended for this device.

Type
boolean

(static) onAdded() → {*}

This function is called when this device is added for the first time from the pairing wizard.

Returns:
Type
*

(static) onData(data)

This function is called when the 'data' event is emmitted. The default implementation will check the data object for capability changes and sets the new values automatically.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

The incoming data object.

(static) onDeleted()

This function is called when a user deletes this device from Homey. Note. When overriding this.onDeleted() make sure you call super.onDeleted() to ensure that all listeners are removed correctly!

(static) parseIncomingData(incomingData) → {Object|null}

This function is called after payloadToData but before the 'data' event is emitted. This function can be used to add custom mutations on the data depending on this.getSettings() or other device instance specific values.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
incomingData Object

The incoming data object
Returns:

result The data that should be emitted or null if the data should be dropped.

Type
Object | null

(static) parseOutgoingData(outgoingData) → {Object|null}

This function is called in this.send just before the data turned into a payload array and send by Homey. This function can be used to add custom mutations on the data depending on this.getSettings() or other device instance specific values.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
outgoingData Object

The outgoing data object
Returns:

result The data that should be send by Homey or null if the data should not be send.

Type
Object | null

(static) payloadToData(payload) → {Object|null}

Static method that parses a payload array to a device data object

Parameters:
Name Type Description
payload Array.<number>
Returns:

result the parsed data object

Type
Object | null

(static) send(dataopt, optionsopt) → {Promise}

This function can be called to send data for this device.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
data Object <optional>

(a part of) The data that you want to send
options Object <optional>

The options object

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
signal Object <optional>

A different signal instance to call the 'send' function on
repetitions Number <optional>

A custom amount of repetitions to use for the signal
Returns:

result A promise which resolves after the data is send.

Type
Promise

(static) sendProgramSignal() → {Promise}

This function should send a program signal to the device. You can access the device and its properties on 'this' The default implementation of this function calls this.send() without data which will send the this.getData() object This method is only necessary when your driver uses the 'program' rf_template

Returns:

result a promise which resolves after the sending of the program signal is complete

Type
Promise

(static) setCapabilityListeners(capabilities)

This function is called when the device is inited or the capabilities array is changed while pairing this device. Note that you should register all capability listeners inside this function an nowhere else to guarantee that they are set correctly during pairing

Parameters:
Name Type Description
capabilities Array.<String>

The capabilities array of the device.

Events

after_send

Fired fired after this.signal.send is finished.

Properties:
Name Type Description
data Object

The data object that was send

after_send_cmd

Fired fired after this.signal.cmd is finished.

Properties:
Name Type Description
cmd Signal

The command that was send

before_send

Fired when this.send is called, before this.parseOutgoingData is called.

Properties:
Name Type Description
data Object

The data object to be send

before_send_cmd

Fired when this.cmd is called.

Properties:
Name Type Description
cmd String

The command to be send

data

Fired when a new data object is received and parsed by this.payloadToData

Properties:
Name Type Description
data Object

The data object received

error

Fired when a error occured

Properties:
Name Type Description
err Error

The error that occurred

send

Fired when this.send is called, just before this calling this.signal.send is called.

Properties:
Name Type Description
data Object

The data object to be send
frame Object

The frame that will be given to this.signal.send
dataCheck Object

The result of this.RFDevice#payloadToData(frame)

send_cmd

Fired when this.cmd is called, just before this calling this.signal.cmd is called.

Properties:
Name Type Description
cmd String

The command to be send
cmdObj cmdObj

The parsed command
